#### We are a team of researchers across institutions who have been volunteering our time. 

### Our Values

{{< dtext "Making forest data from India Findable, Accessible, Interoperable and Reusable. 
[Read more](https://www.go-fair.org/fair-principles/) about the FAIR guidelines." summary="FAIR data" >}}  

{{< dtext "Committing to data sharing practices that center data owners, especially in India." summary="Fair sharing" >}}

{{< dtext "We aim to make all our processes transparent and reproducible through GitHub." summary="Reproducible methods" >}}

{{< dtext "Sharing tools and techniques among forest researchers in India." summary="Collaborative learning" >}}
